body:
Hello everyone!

My name is Grayson, and I've recently joined this server. :3

I hope to get to know you all! 
Thanks. c:

Welcome! I hope you enjoy your stay at The Avicus Network :) If you need any help don't hesitate to contact me or any of the staff members!
Have a nice day!
-Vlad

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus :) Care to elaborate on your name?
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to Avicus :) Care to elaborate on your name?

replies.body:
I don't know. I really liked "Sanity", but it was taken.
I then was thinking of SanityMC, but I didn't want to be a cliche with "MC" at the end.
I ended up using SanityPrevails, because I thought it sounded cool and I like it.

Thank you for the welome! :)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Ah, I assumed it had some deeper meaning. But depending on the context, insanity prevails.

Anyways, come join plug.dj :( I'm all alone haha
